resources.string: Tricon International Overseas (P) Ltd. is established with an intention to provide qualitative and quantitative candidates for international job market. It is legally established Manpower Company approved by Government for supplying various categories of Nepalese human resources abroad. It supplies all categories - skilled, semiskilled, unskilled, trained and professional workers based on the requirement of its clients. It functions as a bridge between Nepal and international job area/ labour market. Tricon International Overseas (P) Ltds aim is to meet the requirement of the abroad that our clients around the world demand and to reduce the increased unemployment burden of the country. Tricon International Overseas (P) Ltd. believes in work so once who join hand with us is always seek for our quality service. To define it in one line "It is a complete solution for abroad job seekers and employer seeking for excellent Nepalese job performance.".
